name: One for the Pages
description:
One for the Pages

-- About the game --

Inspired by the Neverending Story movie, this little puzzle/adventure game traps you in a tree house with a mysterious book. You must use your surroundings in the room to affect the world within the book. 

With windows, light switches and objects within the room you can influence the wind, day/night cycle and materialise any object into the medieval book world. 

-- Platform --

This game was designed to be played on windows PC

-- Controls --

  • Movement - Use WASD
  • Interact with objects - Use mouse to look around and Left click to interact
  • Exit game - press the 'escape' key anytime
  • Hints/More info - During the game play press the 'i' key

-- Credits -- 

  • Kayla Gilligan
  • Raphael Peel-Fowler
  • Tyler Drew-Jack
  • Aaron Ross
  • Damin Goubter

Made in Unity3D 2017 (very old version)
